name: icanhasweb-minimalist
description: A minimalistic CSS theme, used at icanhasweb.net

scripts.build: npm run build-styles && npm run build-fonts
scripts.build-styles: node-sass src/style.scss dist/style.css && node-sass src/style.medium.scss dist/style.medium.css && node-sass src/style.large.scss dist/style.large.css

author: Arne Hassel <arneh@inrupt.com>
